skills.name: Flower Pick
desc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **50%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **60%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **70%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **80%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **90%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to **100%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: A Scoop of Moon
desc: Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **14%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **15%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **20%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **21%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **23%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by **25%** until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

skills.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to **120%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **128%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **136%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **144%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **152%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **160%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **170%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **180%** of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

skills.name: Celestial Jade
desc:
When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.
If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.
While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **36%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.
If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.
While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **40%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **43%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.
While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **47%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **50%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by **54%**, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

skills.name: Game Solitaire
desc: After using Technique, Qingque draws 2 jade tile(s) when the battle starts.

skills.name: Cherry on Top!
desc:
Deals Quantum DMG equal to **120%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **50%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

Deals Quantum DMG equal to **144%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **60%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

Deals Quantum DMG equal to **168%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **70%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

Deals Quantum DMG equal to **192%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **80%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

Deals Quantum DMG equal to **216%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **90%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

Deals Quantum DMG equal to **240%** of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to **100%** of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

eidolons.name: Sleep on the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque immediately regenerates 1 Energy.

eidolons.name: Read Between the Tiles
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Right on the Tiles
eidolons.desc:
After this character's Skill is used, there is a 24% fixed chance to gain Autarky, which lasts until the end of the current turn. 
With Autarky, using Basic ATK or Enhanced Basic ATK immediately launches 1 follow-up attack on the same target, dealing Quantum DMG equal to 100% of the previous Basic ATK (or Enhanced Basic ATK)'s DMG.

eidolons.name: Gambit for the Tiles
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Prevail Beyond the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Recovers 1 Skill Point after using Enhanced Basic ATK.

skillTree.name: Tile Battle
skillTree.desc: Restores 1 Skill Point when using the Skill. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

skillTree.name: Bide Time
skillTree.desc: Using the Skill increases DMG Boost effect of attacks by an extra 10%.

skillTree.name: Winning Hand
skillTree.desc: Qingque's SPD increases by 10% for 1 turn after using the Enhanced Basic ATK.
